trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Alert Rule</languageKeyword> operation updates the specified alert rule.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Alert Rule</languageKeyword> operation updates the specified alert rule.

trans-unit.source: For more information about alert rules and how you can use them, see <externalLink><linkText>Understanding Monitoring Alerts and Notifications in Azure</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn306639.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about alert rules and how you can use them, see <externalLink><linkText>Understanding Monitoring Alerts and Notifications in Azure</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn306639.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Alert Rule</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Alert Rule</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;rule-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the identifier of the alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;rule-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the identifier of the alert rule.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the identifier of an alert rule by using <legacyLink xlink:href="b0c1a80e-f900-474b-8a03-a88f0121ce55" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Alert Rules</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can obtain the identifier of an alert rule by using <legacyLink xlink:href="b0c1a80e-f900-474b-8a03-a88f0121ce55" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Alert Rules</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header must be set to <userInput>2013-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header must be set to <userInput>2013-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Contains the elements that define an alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Contains the elements that define an alert rule.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the conditional parameters for an alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the conditional parameters for an alert rule.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that is performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the action that is performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the GUID identifier for the alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the GUID identifier for the alert rule.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the alert rule.

trans-unit.source: The name can contain only letters, numbers, commas, and periods.
trans-unit.target: The name can contain only letters, numbers, commas, and periods.

trans-unit.source: The name can be up to 32 characters long.
trans-unit.target: The name can be up to 32 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the description of the alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the description of the alert rule.

trans-unit.source: The description can contain only letters, numbers, commas, and periods.
trans-unit.target: The description can contain only letters, numbers, commas, and periods.

trans-unit.source: The description up to 128 characters long.
trans-unit.target: The description up to 128 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the alert rule is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the alert rule is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the conditional parameters for an alert rule.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the conditional parameters for an alert rule.

trans-unit.source: Specifies information about the resource on which the alert is configured.
trans-unit.target: Specifies information about the resource on which the alert is configured.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the operator of the condition.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the operator of the condition.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the threshold value that triggers the alert.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the threshold value that triggers the alert.

trans-unit.source: This must be a positive numeric value.
trans-unit.target: This must be a positive numeric value.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the period of time that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the period of time that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for Cloud Services and Virtual Machines when using host and guest level metrics are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values for Cloud Services and Virtual Machines when using host and guest level metrics are:

trans-unit.source: Possible values for all services when using availability metrics are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values for all services when using availability metrics are:

trans-unit.source: For a description of host, guest, and availability level metrics, see the <languageKeyword>MetricName</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: For a description of host, guest, and availability level metrics, see the <languageKeyword>MetricName</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that is performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the action that is performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the administrators of the service should be notified when the alert is registered.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the administrators of the service should be notified when the alert is registered.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the co-administrators of the service should be notified when the alert is registered.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the co-administrators of the service should be notified when the alert is registered.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of email addresses to use for notification of the registration of an alert.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a list of email addresses to use for notification of the registration of an alert.

trans-unit.source: Specifies information about the resource on which the alert is configured.
trans-unit.target: Specifies information about the resource on which the alert is configured.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relative URI of the resource to which the alert is associated.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the relative URI of the resource to which the alert is associated.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloud-service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloud-service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: You can find this information by using <externalLink><linkText>List Cloud Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee460781.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can find this information by using <externalLink><linkText>List Cloud Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee460781.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;website-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the website.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;website-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the website.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of webspaces, see <externalLink><linkText>List Webspaces</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn166961.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of webspaces, see <externalLink><linkText>List Webspaces</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn166961.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobile-service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobile-service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the namespace of the metric.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the namespace of the metric.

trans-unit.source: Availability metrics are enabled when you enable endpoint monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Availability metrics are enabled when you enable endpoint monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the metric that defines what the alert rule monitors.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the metric that defines what the alert rule monitors.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the following host level metric names:
trans-unit.target: You can specify the following host level metric names:

trans-unit.source: You can specify a guest level metric name which is the name of a performance counter that is assigned to the role instance.
trans-unit.target: You can specify a guest level metric name which is the name of a performance counter that is assigned to the role instance.

trans-unit.source: For more information about performance counters, see <externalLink><linkText>Create and Use Performance Counters in an Azure Application</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh411542.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about performance counters, see <externalLink><linkText>Create and Use Performance Counters in an Azure Application</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh411542.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify availability level metrics.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify availability level metrics.

trans-unit.source: You must use the <codeEntityReference>N:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Monitoring.Metrics</codeEntityReference> API to obtain the metric name when you use the Availability namespace.
trans-unit.target: You must use the <codeEntityReference>N:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Monitoring.Metrics</codeEntityReference> API to obtain the metric name when you use the Availability namespace.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Management Portal to update alerts.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the Management Portal to update alerts.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn306638.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn306638.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
